name: Anno 1800: Royal Edition
summary:
The Royal Edition of Anno 1800 is a pack that contains the base game, Season Passes 1&2, along with the Deluxe Pack, exclusive Anno 1800 items, much like the Pioneers Edition, including soundtrack, artwork and more. It is only available in Germany.

Welcome to the beginning of the industrial age. You decide which way you want to go. Create your own world and a global trading network. Will you lead your company to great success, fame and glory? The Anno 1800: Royal Edition is the perfect edition for newcomers and collectors of the Anno Series.
